question: Why do we not celebrate Eid the same day as Makkah. All other countries follow Saudi Arabia.What is the reasoning behind this?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) has not made Makkah the criteria
for announcement of fast. Rather, he (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) has made
the citing of the moon the criteria for commencement of fasting.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
